(Ok...we're going to have to stop talking OOC, but having Autobot codes would 
really, really have nothing to do with the Cybertronian Fire.  It was only 
manufactured in the last couple of years on Cybertron.  It would have no 
Autobot codes whatsoever)



Punch:


Punch activated the comm. unit on the bridge of the Alliance Base, sending a 
comm. transmission to Zardus.
"Zardus, I'm detecting movement at the Ark.  I believe people are trying to 
repair the base..."
